A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a life long fan this movie ruined star wars for me. If you are a original star wars fan pretend this doesnt exist. Episode 8 answered hardly any questions from previous film and the answers we did get were HUGE let downs. The humor was forced and childish (not in a good way). Also the way luke Skywalker is portrayed was like a slap in the face. The list goes on and on. Disney could care less about fans its all about money. Will not be seeing episode 9.
